sourcesContent:
function New(params){ const {item}=params return(

{item.title}

date: {item.time_published}

authors: {item.authors.length>1?item.authors.map(element=>(

{element}

)):(

{item.authors[0]}

)}

topics: { item.topics && item.topics.length==1 ?

{item.topics[0]}

: item.topics.map(element=>(

{element}

)) }

{item.summary}

source: {item.source}

) } export default New
